results.title: Potential Clickjacking Vulnerability - X-Frame-Options
results.description: The page might be vulnerable to Clickjacking. X-Frame-Options header is either missing or not set to 'DENY'/'SAMEORIGIN'.
results.short_description: The page might be vulnerable to Clickjacking. X-Frame-Options header is either missing or not set to 'DENY'/'SAMEORIGIN'.
results.remediation: Implement the X-Frame-Options header with 'DENY' or 'SAMEORIGIN'. Additionally, consider implementing Content-Security-Policy with frame-ancestors directive for better protection.
results.countermeasures: Implement the X-Frame-Options header with 'DENY' or 'SAMEORIGIN'. Additionally, consider implementing Content-Security-Policy with frame-ancestors directive for better protection.
evidence:
{
  "url": "http://testphp.vulnweb.com/",
  "x_frame_options_header": "Missing",
  "csp_header": "Missing",
  "csp_report_only_header": "Missing",
  "details": "The page could potentially be framed by an attacker due to missing or weak X-Frame-Options header."
}

{
  "url": "http://testphp.vulnweb.com/",
  "x_frame_options_header": "Missing",
  "csp_header": "Missing",
  "csp_report_only_header": "Missing",
  "details": "The page could potentially be framed by an attacker due to missing or weak X-Frame-Options header."
}

results.title: Potential Clickjacking Vulnerability - CSP
results.description: The page might be vulnerable to Clickjacking. Content-Security-Policy header is either missing or does not include frame-ancestors directive.
results.short_description: The page might be vulnerable to Clickjacking. Content-Security-Policy header is either missing or does not include frame-ancestors directive
results.remediation: Implement Content-Security-Policy with frame-ancestors directive. For maximum security, use 'frame-ancestors 'none'' to prevent all framing, or 'frame-ancestors 'self'' to allow only same-origin framing.
results.countermeasures: Implement Content-Security-Policy with frame-ancestors directive. For maximum security, use 'frame-ancestors 'none'' to prevent all framing, or 'frame-ancestors 'self'' to allow only same-origin framing.
evidence:
{
  "url": "http://testphp.vulnweb.com/",
  "x_frame_options_header": "Missing",
  "csp_header": "Missing",
  "csp_report_only_header": "Missing",
  "details": "The page could potentially be framed by an attacker due to missing or weak Content-Security-Policy frame-ancestors directive."
}

  "url": "http://testphp.vulnweb.com/",

results.title: Missing CSRF Protection
results.description: Form submission lacks CSRF protection mechanisms
results.short_description: Form submission lacks CSRF protection mechanisms
results.remediation: Implement CSRF protection using one or more of: CSRF tokens, SameSite cookies, or custom headers.
results.countermeasures: Implement CSRF protection using one or more of: CSRF tokens, SameSite cookies, or custom headers.

results.title: Missing CSRF Token
results.description: Form at 'http://testphp.vulnweb.com/search.php?test=query' does not appear to have a CSRF token. This may make it vulnerable to Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) attacks.
results.short_description: Form at 'http://testphp.vulnweb.com/search.php?test=query' does not appear to have a CSRF token. This may make it vulnerable to Cross-Site R
results.remediation: Implement anti-CSRF tokens for all state-changing operations via forms. Ensure tokens are unique per session/request and validated on the server-side.
results.countermeasures: Implement anti-CSRF tokens for all state-changing operations via forms. Ensure tokens are unique per session/request and validated on the server-side.

results.title: Server Information Disclosure
results.description: Server header reveals technology information: nginx/1.19.0
results.short_description: Server header reveals technology information: nginx/1.19.0
results.remediation: Configure server to not reveal version information.
results.countermeasures: Configure server to not reveal version information.

results.title: Missing Strict-Transport-Security Header
results.description: The Strict-Transport-Security header is missing. Enforces HTTPS connections
results.short_description: The Strict-Transport-Security header is missing. Enforces HTTPS connections
results.remediation: Add the Strict-Transport-Security header with value: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains; preload
results.countermeasures: Add the Strict-Transport-Security header with value: max-age=31536000; includeSubDomains; preload

results.title: Missing X-Content-Type-Options Header
results.description: The X-Content-Type-Options header is missing. Prevents MIME type sniffing
results.short_description: The X-Content-Type-Options header is missing. Prevents MIME type sniffing
results.remediation: Add the X-Content-Type-Options header with value: nosniff
results.countermeasures: Add the X-Content-Type-Options header with value: nosniff

results.title: Missing X-Frame-Options Header
results.description: The X-Frame-Options header is missing. Prevents clickjacking attacks
results.short_description: The X-Frame-Options header is missing. Prevents clickjacking attacks
results.remediation: Add the X-Frame-Options header with value: DENY
results.countermeasures: Add the X-Frame-Options header with value: DENY

results.title: Missing X-XSS-Protection Header
results.description: The X-XSS-Protection header is missing. Legacy header; prefer CSP instead. Some browsers ignore this.
results.short_description: The X-XSS-Protection header is missing. Legacy header; prefer CSP instead. Some browsers ignore this.
results.remediation: Add the X-XSS-Protection header with value: 1; mode=block
results.countermeasures: Add the X-XSS-Protection header with value: 1; mode=block

results.title: Missing Content-Security-Policy Header
results.description: The Content-Security-Policy header is missing. Controls resource loading
results.short_description: The Content-Security-Policy header is missing. Controls resource loading
results.remediation: Add the Content-Security-Policy header with value: default-src 'self'
results.countermeasures: Add the Content-Security-Policy header with value: default-src 'self'

results.title: Missing Referrer-Policy Header
results.description: The Referrer-Policy header is missing. Controls referrer information
results.short_description: The Referrer-Policy header is missing. Controls referrer information
results.remediation: Add the Referrer-Policy header with value: strict-origin-when-cross-origin
results.countermeasures: Add the Referrer-Policy header with value: strict-origin-when-cross-origin

results.title: Missing Permissions-Policy Header
results.description: The Permissions-Policy header is missing. Controls browser features
results.short_description: The Permissions-Policy header is missing. Controls browser features
results.remediation: Add the Permissions-Policy header with value: geolocation=(), microphone=(), camera=()
results.countermeasures: Add the Permissions-Policy header with value: geolocation=(), microphone=(), camera=()

results.title: Missing Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy Header
results.description: The Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy header is missing. Helps isolate browsing context (COOP)
results.short_description: The Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy header is missing. Helps isolate browsing context (COOP)
results.remediation: Add the Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy header with value: same-origin
results.countermeasures: Add the Cross-Origin-Opener-Policy header with value: same-origin

results.title: Missing Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy Header
results.description: The Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy header is missing. Requires cross-origin resources to grant permission (COEP)
results.short_description: The Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy header is missing. Requires cross-origin resources to grant permission (COEP)
results.remediation: Add the Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy header with value: require-corp
results.countermeasures: Add the Cross-Origin-Embedder-Policy header with value: require-corp

results.title: Missing Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy Header
results.description: The Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy header is missing. Controls cross-origin resource sharing (CORP)
results.short_description: The Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy header is missing. Controls cross-origin resource sharing (CORP)
results.remediation: Add the Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy header with value: same-origin
results.countermeasures: Add the Cross-Origin-Resource-Policy header with value: same-origin

results.title: Missing X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies Header
results.description: The X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies header is missing. Prevents Adobe cross-domain policy abuse
results.short_description: The X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies header is missing. Prevents Adobe cross-domain policy abuse
results.remediation: Add the X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies header with value: none
results.countermeasures: Add the X-Permitted-Cross-Domain-Policies header with value: none
